## PromotionOptions

<GenerationInfo sourceFile="packages/core/src/config/vendure-config.ts" sourceLine="705" packageName="@vendure/core" />



```ts title="Signature"
interface PromotionOptions {
    promotionConditions?: Array<PromotionCondition<any>>;
    promotionActions?: Array<PromotionAction<any>>;
}
```
